heading: Career education.
general-note: Here are entered works on the efforts of educational institutions and the community to teach individuals the values of a work-oriented society in preparation for meaningful employment. Works on vocational instruction within the standard educational system, usually at the secondary level, are entered under. Vocational education.. Works on the process of training individuals in a particular skill after termination of their formal education are entered under. Occupational training.. Works on retraining persons with obsolete vocational skills are entered under. Occupational retraining.. Works on on-the-job training of employees are entered under. Employees--Training of..
